name: com.rmc.rmc-dots
description: DOTS library for Unity Development by Rivello Multimedia Consulting
author: rmc (github.com/SamuelAsherRivello)

samples.description: DOTS fundamental learning lessons using the RMC DOTS library.
Each demo demonstrates *one* feature using the RMC DOTS library.
samples.path: RMC DOTS/Samples~/2. RMC DOTS Library Demos

samples.description: Each toy demonstrates *multiple* features using the RMC DOTS library.
samples.path: RMC DOTS/Samples~/3. RMC DOTS Library Toys

samples.description: Game samples using the RMC DOTS library.
samples.path: RMC DOTS/Samples~/4. RMC DOTS Game Samples

samples.description: Game templates using the RMC DOTS library.
samples.path: RMC DOTS/Samples~/5. RMC DOTS Game Templates
